newsitem.title: NEW ZEALAND: RUGBY UNION-NZ ALL BLACKS NAMED TO PLAY TEST V FIJI.
newsitem.headline: RUGBY UNION-NZ ALL BLACKS NAMED TO PLAY TEST V FIJI.

text.p: The All Black rugby team to play Fiji in a test match at North Harbour stadium next Saturday was named on Sunday by coach John Hart.

Team: 15-Christian Cullen; 14-Jeff Wilson, 11-Tana Umaga, 13-Frank Bunce, 12-Lee Stensness; 10-Andrew Mehrtens, 9-Justin Marshall; 8-Taine Randell, 7-Josh Kronfeld, 6-Michael Jones, 5-Ian Jones, 4-Robin Brooke, 3-Craig Dowd, 2-Sean Fitzpatrick (captain), 1-Olo Brown.
